Description: ****** Scroll down for 55 High Definition images and pictures inside ****** Here's a 2004 Gibson Les Paul Custom Shop Elegant in a AAAAA flamed Tangerine burst. The flame on this one is so think, you can feel it with your fingers - scroll down to see close up detailed pics. It is in excellent condition and only has light playwear. The guitar has a few micro indents on the top. The back has some light indents as well. It has an ebony fingerboard and abalone inlays. The pickups are Active EMG 60 and EMG 81 - One of the most popular EMG’s, the 81 is the one that started a revolution. Utilizing powerful ceramic magnets and close aperture coils, the tone was designed with detailed intensity, incredible amounts of high end cut, and fluid sustain. Traditionally used in the bridge position of your guitar, this humbucking pickup will make your leads slice right through even the densest mix. When used in both neck and bridge positions the sound can only be described as blistering. The 60 humbucker packs plenty of output with a balance of thick, boosted mids, big lows and singing highs. Featuring close aperture coils, similar to a mini-humbucker, this model produces rich harmonic overtones with plenty of sustain. Due to its ceramic magnets, the EMG 60 has a full treble response and loads of output great for distinct single-note solos. The 60 provides clarity and character to your guitar and works very well in the neck position. The frets are in excellent condition and the finish is very clean. It weighs 8.3 lbs. on a digital scale and has a 60's neck. It has just been deep cleaned and detailed. The front, back and sides were waxed and buffed with a high grade carnuba wax. The frets were polished and the fingerboard was cleaned, buffed and moisturized with an instrument grade lemon oil. It was set up with 10/46's, adjusted and plays very nicely. All the electronics work as they should. Comes with the Gibson Custom Shop hardshell case and Certificate of Authenticity as seen in the pictures. This guitar will be safely packed and shipped. Buyer to pay $60 FedEx shipping anywhere in the U.S. Full insurance included in shipping. California residents please add 8 % sales tax. Local San Diego pickup always welcome. Will ship worldwide. International shipping guidelines: Buyer is responsible for any import duties. We can declare a low value. FedEx Ground to Canada is $175 with full insurance. FedEx or USPS Express is $245 to most parts of Europe and the UK. FedEx is $295 to Asia and Australia. Full insurance available. Please call or email me if you have any questions - 858-531-2287
